summary: The story of the romance between Emma, Lady Hamilton, and British war hero Admiral Horatio Nelson.
cast: Corinne Griffith|Victor Varconi|H.B. Warner|Ian Keith|Marie Dressler|Montagu Love|William Conklin|Dorothy Cumming|Michael Vavitch|Evelyn Hall|Helen Jerome Eddy|Ben Alexander|Joan Bennett|Leroy Boles|Jackie Combs|Godfrey Craig|Vondell Darr|Andy Devine|Mary Foy|Harold Goodwin|Julia Swayne Gordon|Howard Hickenlooper|Walter James|Bob Kortman|Joel McCrea|Louis Mercier|Robert Parrish|Gil Perkins|Charles Thurston|Grant Withers
title: Trafalgar
